Entry.JapaneseText: どこをどう見ても、ペトナジャンカだよなぁ…… そっか、これは夢だ！
Entry.EnglishText: No matter how you look at it, this has gotta be Petnadjanka... I know, I must be dreaming!

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、でも、おれはさっきまで、 あの遺跡にいたし、眠くもなかったし……
Entry.EnglishText: No, but, when I was in the ruins just now, I wasn't tired at all...

Entry.JapaneseText: いやいや、ここが本物で、遺跡の夢を…… ……ダメだ、わかんねぇ！
Entry.EnglishText: Wait no, this is the real deal, and the ruins are the dream... It's no good, none of this makes any sense!
